data.name: Sample - Pensando Policy Service Manager - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Pensando Policy Service Manager" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Debug - Reset Session State
workflows.description: Debug login by resetting session state on disk.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Debug - Reset Session State

workflows.name: Debug - Expire Auth Cookie
workflows.description: Debug login by expiring the auth cookie on disk.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Debug - Expire Auth Cookie

workflows.name: Enable IPFIX Export for Host
workflows.description: Enable IPFIX Flow Export of all flows for a source IP from the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Enable IPFIX Export for Host

routes.name: Start -> Enable IPFIX Export for Host

workflows.name: Delete Existing Mirror Traffic Export for Host
workflows.description: Delete ERSPAN Mirror Traffic Export for a source IP from the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Delete Existing Mirror Traffic Export for Host

steps.name: Delete Existing Mirror Traffic Export for Host

arguments.name: Pensando Policy Service Manager
arguments.operationTitle: Delete Existing Mirror Traffic Export for Host

routes.name: Start -> Delete Existing Mirror Traffic Export for Host

workflows.name: Delete existing IPFIX Export for Host
workflows.description: Delete IPFIX Flow Export of all flows for a source IP from the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Delete existing IPFIX Export for Host

steps.name: Delete existing IPFIX Export for Host

arguments.name: Pensando Policy Service Manager
arguments.operationTitle: Delete existing IPFIX Export for Host

routes.name: Start -> Delete existing IPFIX Export for Host

workflows.name: Debug - Remove Session State
workflows.description: Debug login by removing session state from disk.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Debug - Remove Session State

workflows.name: Get Workloads
workflows.description: Get a list of Workloads from the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Get Workloads

workflows.name: Add IOC IPs to Blocklist
workflows.description: Add one or more IOC IPs to a block list on the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Add IOC IPs to Blocklist

routes.name: Start -> Add IOC IPs to Blocklist

workflows.name: Remove IOC Blocklist
workflows.description: Entirely remove the IOC block list from the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Remove IOC Blocklist

workflows.name: Get Networks
workflows.description: Get a list of Networks from the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Get Networks

workflows.name: Get Distributed Service Cards
workflows.description: Get a list of Distributed Service Cards from the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Get Distributed Service Cards

workflows.name: Get Network Security Policies
workflows.description: Get the Network Security Policy list from the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Get Network Security Policies

workflows.name: Enable Mirror Traffic Export for Host
workflows.description: Enable Mirror Traffic Export of traffic flows for a source IP on the Pensand PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Enable Mirror Traffic Export for Host

steps.name: Enable Mirror Traffic Export for Host

arguments.name: Pensando Policy Service Manager
arguments.operationTitle: Enable Mirror Traffic Export for Host

routes.name: Start -> Enable Mirror Traffic Export for Host

workflows.name: Remove IOC IPs from Blocklist
workflows.description: Remove one or more IOC IPs from a block list on the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Remove IOC IPs from Blocklist

routes.name: Start -> Remove IOC IPs from Blocklist

workflows.name: Get Alerts
workflows.description: Get a list of Alerts from the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Get Alerts

workflows.name: Isolate Host
workflows.description: Quarantine a Host (Disallow all North/South/East/West inbound and outbound traffic) on the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Isolate Host

workflows.name: Unisolate Host
workflows.description: Remove Host quarantine (Remove North/South/East/West inbound and outbound traffic block) on the Pensando PSM Server.

arguments.title: Pensando Policy Service Manager: Unisolate Host
